tags: I'm not actually going anywhere rn
but also life's too short not to wear fun socks
summary:
I just asked myself, 
"What would Mollymauk Tealeaf do?" 
and then chose a more garish outfit, 
so you could say I'm living my...
body:
I just asked myself,

“What would Mollymauk Tealeaf do?”

and then chose a more garish outfit,

so you could say I’m living my best life.

reblog.comment:

“What would Mollymauk Tealeaf do?”

and then chose a more garish outfit,

so you could say I’m living my best life.

trail.content_raw:

and then chose a more garish outfit,

so you could say I’m living my best life.
trail.content:
I just asked myself,

“What would Mollymauk Tealeaf do?”

and then chose a more garish outfit,

so you could say I’m living my best life.

blog.name: bixbiboom
blog.title: I myself am also Enchanter Pumat Sol
blog.description:
Bixbi, older than you.

Fat queer of indeterminate origin.

Possibly a lesser demon.

Hellenist serving Hestia, Hermes and Chiron.

Critical Role has taken over my life and my blog.

Taliesin Jaffe is my boyfriend.

I love you.

#eyesnevershut

body:
Critical Role ep 104

Matt says that the water from the Island of Renewal is warm, a good 75-80 degrees and I had a little horrified moment before remembering he meant farenheit and not celsius.

blog.name: captain-narava-felidae-riggs
blog.title: The tide has washed the nice from me
blog.description: WOW/SWTOR. Captain Narava of both worlds. Goblin. My hobbies include: Crying while watching hockey, crying while watching Critical Role, and crying while watching Glee clips on YouTube. Also knitting. Over 40 and cool with it. Perniciously Aneimic, hella anxious, depressed widow, biromantic demisexual . Slytherin. OTP: Narava/Corso, Alt OTP: Avarane/Corso, Completely different fandom otp: Perc'ahlia. Pens/Stanley Cup. She/her. Unless you’re Taliesin Jaffe, I’m not interested.

tags: like from the get go i was calling this my pipe dream doodle
at least maybe the cold will do the job a bit..........? idk.
summary: gentle repose[[MORE]] sooo i actually drew this in my sketchbook the day after ep 26, while out in the wilderness camping lol. i...
caption:
gentle repose

sooo i actually drew this in my sketchbook the day after ep 26, while out in the wilderness camping lol. i didn’t figure caleb had learned this spell yet, but i liked the idea of it and wanted to draw him casting it while everyone gathered around molly and just dealt with what happened in their own ways. it’s just one of those things where the image is stuck in your head and nagging you until you put it out. sooo… here it is. 

sorry lol.

i’m still not ok with what happened in that ep in a lot of ways, but while ep 27 went differently than i had expected, i am a little less crushed by it??? like just knowing they are trying makes it hurt less. so… it did leave some hope. 

bonus:

i also had a few other doodles for this, but this was the only presentable one:

me drawing beau crying in both of these tho:

also, music i was looping during working on this, if you wanna feel more:

and

anyway i’m going to draw a shitload of chibis and fluff stuff to make up for this, sorry everyone lol.

tags: i wish they were on spotify
summary: Hey is there an easy way to listen to Critical Role that I don’t know about? I can’t afford YouTube Red and the only time I can...
body:
Hey is there an easy way to listen to Critical Role that I don’t know about? I can’t afford YouTube Red and the only time I can really concentrate and listen to it is at work. I just need to be able to somehow download them to my phone so I can listen to them while working.


I just finished TAZ and I REALLY want to listen to CR.

reblog.comment:
